projects.title: Pizza Restaurant
projects.description: Restaurant page I had to CSS it all around to make it look good. The magic of CSS ^-^

projects.title: Horned Beast
projects.description: A website I made with React & NodeJS. The Website is a simple site where you have to vote for the posts you like. The most voted post wins.

projects.title: Restaurant
projects.description: This is a simple restaurant That I made with pure HTML & CSS. The restaurant has a menu and a table. The menu has a list of items that you can order them and the table has a list of items. The table has a total price . The items have a name, price and a button to add to the table.
